subject: Re: [junit] Checking the sync of the objects.
msgSnippet: Probably out of scope of junit mailing list... anyway.... How about for every amendment / create we also send the checksum of the objects status, then have a
messageBody:
Probably out of scope of junit mailing list... anyway.... How about for
every amendment / create we also send the checksum of the objects status,
then have a method to check if after applying the amendment, generate the
checksum again base on the latest status of the object, and check if the
checksum as expected?

On Wed, Aug 6, 2008 at 8:10 PM, Swapnil <swap_masane@...> wrote:

> Please help me out:
> I have a method that restricts the method to be synchronized.
> I want a test the method for the objects to be in sync.
>
>
>


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
